short_summary: The Courts Administration Service (CAS) requires assistance with Wi-Fi infrastructure
description: The Courts Administration Service (CAS) requires assistance with tasks centered on the deployment, operation, administration and maintenance of Wi-Fi infrastructure across Canada. The first bidder will be engaged by the Crown in accordance with the preferences of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).",

full_summary:
Name of Tender | Nuage gouvernemental Canada - Requête de proposition Government Cloud Services - TBIPS SA – Volet 3 Infrastructures Wi-Fi
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Document Reference** | PW-22-01018530
**Accounting Classification** | 902204 – Services professionnels informatiques

**Tender Status**
This announcement has expired, and the tender closing date was January 10, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Government of Canada Contracting Entity**
Courts Administration Service (CAS)
Address:
90 Sparks Street,
Ottawa,
Ontario,
K1A 0H9,
Canada

**Contact Information**
Darlene Simms
Contracting Authority
Contact Email: procurement-approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca

**Services**
The Courts Administration Service (CAS) is seeking technical expertise to deploy, install, configure, operate, administer and maintain Wi-Fi infrastructure across Canada.
**Services Width**
Bidders may submit a bid for one of the three resource categories (T-01, G-03, B-01).
Service Level Security
Common PS SRCL #19 applies to this requirement. The minimum corporate security required is not applicable, and the minimum resource security required is Secret.
**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is open to suppliers located in Canada and is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other agreements 

**How to Obtain Documents**
To obtain the documents, please contact the contracting authority listed above or visit the Canadian Government’s procurement platform at <https://canadabuys.ca/>. Documents will be sent to Qualified Holders of a Supply Arrangement via email.

**Submission of Bids**
Bidders can submit a bid by December 2023 SIM to obtain the required Technical Architect – Level 3.

Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #19 applies
Security Level: S3 S (Secret)
